ownership: Privately Held; part of Sirius International Holding (IHC portfolio); UAE-headquartered.
core_products: AI-powered technology and analytics solutions for energy transition projects, including Smart Grid Suite, Meter Data Management System (MDMS), Head-End System (HES) for AMI, Energy Mobility (EV), Analytics & AI, IoT Products, and Climate Tech.

active_countries.activity_description: HQ; part of IHC/Sirius portfolio; offices in Dubai and Abu Dhabi.
Large AMI/MDMS projects; Adani JV for accelerated smart-meter rollout.
Nationwide smart-gas program (~2.5M meters; ~US$480M; ~14-year term) with SOCAR/Azerigaz via IntelliGrid/Presight.

products.product_description: Comprehensive Cloud-Edge Platform solutions and services designed to enable the end-to-end digital transformation of energy distribution grids.
Utility-grade MDMS with billing determinants, analytics, alarms, revenue protection, and support for prepaid/postpaid across electricity, water, and gas.
Multi-protocol ingestion layer for meters/devices; cloud-ready and scalable for AMI across electricity/water/gas.
Implementation of EV infrastructure, enabling a seamless transition to electric mobility.
Cutting-edge analytics and artificial intelligence solutions empowering energy companies with data-driven insights to enhance efficiency, reliability, and sustainability.
Diverse lineup of devices, from smart meters to sophisticated sensors and controllers, designed for modernizing electricity, water, and gas utility grids.
Infrastructure and solutions for EV charging networks and grid-scale/behind-the-meter storage.
Addressing climate change challenges by decarbonization, utilizing emerging technologies like blockchain and artificial intelligence.

services.service_description: Planning, rollout and integration across HES→MDMS→billing/ERP/SCADA, including device onboarding and field operations.
Advanced analytics and AI frameworks for utilities, delivered via the IntelliGrid JV.
Commercial and technical frameworks with utilities (e.g., Electrica) to fund and deliver grid modernisation, AMI, EV charging and storage.

recent_moves.move_description: On April 16, 2025, Esyasoft agreed a ~£99.4m all-cash takeover of listed UK supplier Good Energy (ticker GOOD.L); completion followed approvals.
US$480m, ~2.5M meters over ~14 years with SOCAR/Azerigaz; program aligned to IntelliGrid/Presight delivery.
On June 6, 2024, Esyasoft and Presight formed 'IntelliGrid' to accelerate AMI and smart-gas/smart-grid deployments.
On August 12, 2024, Esyasoft acquired a 70% stake in Dutch innovator Float IoT, expanding into smart-water technology.
On September 2, 2024, Esyasoft was recognized as a Sample Vendor in the Gartner Market Guide for Meter Data Management Systems 2024.
On November 25, 2024, Esyasoft Holding joined the United Nations Global Compact Initiative.
On December 27, 2023, Adani Energy Solutions acquired 49% of Esyasoft’s smart-metering arm, renamed Adani Esyasoft Smart Solutions Ltd., to accelerate AMI rollout in India.

recent_moves.move_description: On July 1, 2023, Aldar Properties PJSC completed the acquisition of a 65% stake in Eltizam Asset Management Estate LLC from International Holding Company PJSC and Abu Dhabi National Exhibitions Company PJSC.
In March 2022, Eltizam established LITE Development & Consulting to provide comprehensive development management services, including design, project, and cost management.
In August 2025, Eltizam launched Omnius Estate Services, offering technology-powered end-to-end property management services across the MENA region.
In September 2021, Eltizam acquired Inspire Integrated for AED 37 million to expand its real estate, infrastructure property management, facilities management, and project delivery services.
In January 2022, Eltizam expanded its MENA presence through a partnership with Colliers, enhancing its portfolio in existing and emerging markets.

partnerships.partnership_description: In January 2022, Eltizam partnered with Colliers to deepen services and maximize real estate potential for clients in the MENA region.
